Oppo Reno 13 series launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset: Check price, specifications and more | Mint - Mint
summary:
Oppo Reno 13 Series Launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Chipset

Date: January 9, 2023 Source: Live Mint

Oppo has unveiled its latest smartphones, the Reno 13 5G and Reno 13 Pro 5G, featuring MediaTek's cutting-edge Dimensity 8350 chipset and a variety of impressive specifications compared to their predecessors.

  • Pricing: Reno 13 Pro 5G starts at ₹49,999, and Reno 13 5G starts at ₹37,999.
  • Launch Date: Both devices available for purchase starting January 11, 2023, via Flipkart and Oppo's official store.
  • Specifications: Both models operate on ColorOS 15 based on Android 15, with up to 12GB RAM and 512GB storage.
  • Display: Reno 13 Pro features a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED, while the Reno 13 has a 6.59-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display.
  • Camera: Both models include a powerful 50MP front camera, with the Pro model featuring a robust triple rear camera setup.
  • Fast Charging: Supports 80W fast charging along with excellent dust and water resistance ratings (IP66, IP68, IP69).
“The Reno 13 Pro 5G boasts a triple rear camera setup, featuring a 50MP Sony IMX890 sensor with OIS and 3.5x optical zoom.”

The launch of the Oppo Reno 13 series in India marks a significant advancement in smartphone technology, appealing particularly to photography enthusiasts and gamers alike.
newTitle: Oppo Reno 13 Series Launched in India with Advanced MediaTek Dimensity Chipset

Jammu & Kashmir Sets Up Special ICU Ward Amid Rising HMPV Concerns - Elets
summary:
Jammu & Kashmir Sets Up Special ICU Ward Amid Rising HMPV Concerns

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Elets News Network

In response to growing concerns over the Human Metapneumovirus (HMPV), the Jammu and Kashmir (J&K) Government has proactively established a special ICU ward in Jammu to address potential cases of the respiratory virus.

  • Five confirmed cases of HMPV reported in India, leading to nationwide discussions.
  • ICMR is closely monitoring HMPV spread, which typically peaks during winter and early spring.
  • Union Health Minister assures public that India’s healthcare system is prepared.
  • The ICU ward in J&K will enhance care for patients at higher risk.
  • Collaboration with private healthcare organizations to address the situation effectively.
“We are committed to ensuring the health and safety of our citizens. The establishment of a special ICU ward in Jammu is part of our preparedness to tackle any emerging health situation effectively.” - Chaudhary Lal Singh, J&K Health Minister

The establishment of the ICU ward highlights the importance of proactive measures in managing emerging health threats like HMPV.
newTitle: Jammu & Kashmir Establishes ICU Ward to Combat HMPV Concerns

OPPO Reno 13 series launched with MediaTek D 8350 chip: Check price, specs - Business Standard
summary:
OPPO Reno 13 Series Launched with MediaTek D 8350 Chip

Publication Date: Jan 09 2025 | Source: Business Standard

China's OPPO has launched its Reno 13 series in India, which includes Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro smartphones, powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 System-on-Chip.

  • Reno 13 price starts at Rs 37,999; Reno 13 Pro starts at Rs 49,999.
  • Smartphones feature Android 15-based ColorOS 15 with AI imaging tools.
  • Available for pre-order with open sales starting on January 11, 2025.
  • Customers can get discounts and exchange bonuses during the launch period.
“The Reno 13 series smartphones are equipped with AI-driven features designed to enhance the user experience in imaging and productivity.”

In conclusion, the OPPO Reno 13 series combines advanced technology with attractive pricing, poised to capture consumer interest.
newTitle: OPPO Reno 13 Series Launched with MediaTek D 8350 Chip: Price and Specs

title: Sunil Gavaskar Predicts India's Next Captain After Rohit Sharma: 'He Leads From The Front' - News18
summary:
Sunil Gavaskar Predicts India's Next Captain After Rohit Sharma: 'He Leads From The Front'

Publication Date: January 09, 2025
Source: News18

Legendary former cricketer Sunil Gavaskar believes that Jasprit Bumrah is set to become India's next captain after Rohit Sharma, possibly in the near future. Gavaskar praises Bumrah for his leadership qualities.

  • Gavaskar mentioned that Bumrah leads from the front and supports his bowlers without putting pressure on them.
  • Bumrah has already captained India in key matches during the 2024-25 Border-Gavaskar Trophy.
  • The future of Rohit Sharma as captain is under scrutiny after India's series loss in Australia.
  • The BCCI is expected to review the captaincy soon, with Bumrah as the leading candidate.
  • Concerns about Bumrah's workload may affect his captaincy role, given he is a key player in all formats.
“He could be the next man. I think he will be the next man. Because he leads from the front.” - Sunil Gavaskar

In conclusion, as India grapples with leadership changes, Bumrah stands out as a capable and supportive leader, although his workload management will be crucial moving forward.
newTitle: Sunil Gavaskar Predicts India's Next Captain After Rohit Sharma: 'He Leads From The Front'

Game Changer Global Box Office Preview: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani film flirts with Rs 100 crore opening day - PINKVILLA
summary:
Game Changer Global Box Office Preview: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani film flirts with Rs 100 crore opening day

Publication Date: January 09, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

After the historic success of RRR, Ram Charan's new film Game Changer, directed by Shankar, is set for release and is expected to generate impressive box office numbers.

  • Advance bookings have reportedly reached Rs 32 crore in India.
  • The film aims for an opening day collection between Rs 90 crore and Rs 100 crore.
  • The key market for the film is expected to be Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.
  • The film has generated significant pre-sales, with Rs 10 crore in the overseas market.
  • Game Changer could capitalize on a lack of competition in theaters for two weeks.
"Game Changer is looking to open in the range of Rs 90.00 crore to Rs 100.00 crore, with an outside chance to hit a century at the box office on the first day, if reports come in the favour of the film."

The anticipation for Game Changer is high, and it is crucial for the film to have a strong opening to ensure continued success at the box office.
newTitle: Game Changer Global Box Office Preview: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani film flirts with Rs 100 crore opening day

title: Sonu Sood says he is 'not on talking terms' with Kangana Ranaut after 'Manikarnika': 'I feel that it’s he - TOI Etimes
summary:
Sonu Sood Reveals Rift with Kangana Ranaut After 'Manikarnika'

Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Actor Sonu Sood has opened up about his ongoing feud with Kangana Ranaut, confirming they are 'not on talking terms' following his departure from the film 'Manikarnika: The Queen Of Jhansi'.

  • The rift began in 2019 when Sonu left the film due to professional commitments.
  • Despite the estrangement, Sonu remains close to Kangana's family.
  • He prefers not to speak negatively about former friends and acknowledges feeling hurt by some of Kangana’s remarks.
  • Sonu stated that there have been unsuccessful attempts by a mutual friend to reconcile their relationship.
“I feel that it’s her foolishness... I have no regrets and choose not to respond to such comments.”

In conclusion, the personal and professional separation between Sonu Sood and Kangana Ranaut highlights the complexities of relationships in the film industry.
newTitle: Sonu Sood Reveals Rift with Kangana Ranaut After 'Manikarnika'

Panic in 3 Maharashtra villages as people suffer sudden hairfall, over 30 bald within a week - Moneycontrol
summary:
Panic in 3 Maharashtra villages as people suffer sudden hairfall, over 30 bald within a week

Date: January 09, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

As reports of significant hair loss surged in three villages in Shegaon tehsil, the local health department has been alerted to the phenomenon affecting men, women, and children.

  • Approximately 30 to 40 individuals in Kalvad, Bondgaon, and Hingna villages have experienced sudden hairfall.
  • Residents have referred to this unexpected occurrence as the 'Baldness Virus.'
  • The district health department is investigating the cause and providing assistance.
“The situation is alarming, and we are working to identify the root cause of this condition swiftly.” - District Health Official

This unusual health crisis has raised concerns among local populations, prompting immediate response efforts from health authorities.
newTitle: Sudden Hairfall Causes Panic in Maharashtra Villages

Adani Wilmar's OFS for 20% stake opens January 10, floor price Rs 275 per share - Moneycontrol
summary:
Adani Wilmar's OFS for 20% stake opens January 10, floor price Rs 275 per share

Date: January 09, 2025

Source: Moneycontrol

Adani Commodities is set to sell up to 20% of its stake in Adani Wilmar through an Offer For Sale (OFS) commencing on January 10, with a floor price of Rs 275 per share.

  • OFS will involve a base offer of 13.5% equity with a green shoe option for another 6.5% share.
  • The sale includes 17.54 crore shares, reserving 25% for mutual funds and insurance companies.
  • Multiple brokers are facilitating the OFS, including ICICI Securities and Jefferies.
  • Shares of Adani Wilmar are currently trading at Rs 324, down 13% from last year.
"Adani Commodities LLP will be selling 17.54 crore shares as the Base Offer on January 10 and 13."

The upcoming OFS represents a strategic move for Adani Commodities, aiming to restructure its equity distribution while providing investment opportunities to stakeholders.
newTitle: Adani Wilmar to Offer 20% Stake at Rs 275 per Share Starting January 10

title: Polio cases in Pakistan continue to rise, tally reaches 69 - ETHealthWorld
summary:
Polio Cases in Pakistan Surge to 69, Raising Health Concerns

Published on Jan 9, 2025 by ANI

The recent rise in polio cases in Pakistan is alarming, with the total tally reaching 69 as new cases continue to emerge, particularly in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.

  • A new case reported in Tank, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, adds to the urgency of ongoing vaccination efforts.
  • Highest concentration of cases reported in Balochistan (27 cases), Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (21), and Sindh (19).
  • Polio remains endemic in Pakistan and Afghanistan, posing a significant health risk, especially for children under five.
"Polio remains a grave health challenge for Pakistan, with various factors delaying progress in eradication efforts."

Addressing the polio outbreak is critical, emphasizing the necessity for comprehensive vaccination campaigns and public education to combat vaccine hesitancy.
newTitle: Polio Cases in Pakistan Surge to 69, Raising Health Concerns

Arvind Kejriwal asks EC to bar Parvesh Verma from Delhi election, 'raid his house' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kejriwal Demands Action Against BJP's Parvesh Verma Ahead of Delhi Elections

Publication Date: Jan 09, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Arvind Kejriwal, chief of the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP), has called for the Election Commission to bar BJP candidate Parvesh Verma from the Delhi assembly elections, citing allegations of corrupt practices.

  • Kejriwal accuses Verma of distributing money and organizing job camps in violation of election rules.
  • He urges for an investigation into fake voter registrations and cancellations in the constituency.
  • Kejriwal alleges a broader scheme involving fake applications from individuals purportedly in their names.
  • The Delhi assembly elections are set for February 5, with vote counting on February 8.
“The BJP candidate in the New Delhi Assembly constituency, Parvesh Verma, is organising job camps, openly distributing money... These things come under corrupt practices.” - Arvind Kejriwal

The AAP leader emphasizes the need for action from the Election Commission to ensure fair electoral practices.
newTitle: Kejriwal Demands Action Against BJP's Parvesh Verma Ahead of Delhi Elections
